alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 3:27PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will continue to impact portions of far southern Madison and southeastern Beaverhead Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 322 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm across southeast Beaverhead county moving east at 15 to 20 mph. The strongest storms were tracking east across or adjacent to the Centennial Valley and may produce strong wind gusts and hail up to one half inch in diameter along with lightning and brief rainfall. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lima, Monida, Dell, Bannack Pass, Lakeview, Snowline, Red Rock Pass and Raynolds Pass. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 1 and 28 . Highway 287 between mile markers 1 and 6 , and between mile markers 1 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
